channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: エンデバー・グループ・ホールディングスの議決権株式の〜71％を所有するシルバーレイクが、同社を非公開化する計画に取り組んでいると発表。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Silver Lake, which owns ~71% of the voting stake in Endeavor Group Holdings, says it is working on a plan to take the company private; EDR rose 24%+ after hours  —  The owner of WME and IMG said it was exploring options, but will keep its majority interest in TKO, the company that controls UFC and WWE

item.title: 情報源Spotify、2024年第1四半期にロイヤリティ・モデルの大幅変更を計画、楽曲がロイヤリティを発生し始めるまでの年間最低ストリーム数の閾値も（Tim Ingham/Music Business Worldwide）
item.description:
Tim Ingham / Music Business Worldwide:
Sources: Spotify plans major changes to its royalty model in Q1 2024, including a threshold of minimum annual streams before a track starts generating royalties  —  SPOTIFY IS CHANGING ITS ROYALTY MODEL - AND WANTS TO SHIFT $1BN TO ‘WORKING ARTISTS’  —  BELIEVE GENERATED $234M IN Q3, UP 9.1% YOY PEERMUSIC ACQUIRES IN NORWAY

item.title: アリ・エマニュエルのタレント・エージェンシー兼スポーツ会社であるエンデバーが、売却の可能性もある会社の戦略的代替案の正式な検討を発表（Mike Calia/CNBC）
item.description:
Mike Calia / CNBC:
Endeavor, Ari Emanuel's talent agency and sports company, announces a formal review of strategic alternatives for the company, which could mean a potential sale  —  - Ari Emanuel's Endeavor Group Holdings will explore strategic alternatives, which could include a sale.

item.title: アルジャジーラは、ガザ支局長ワエル・アル＝ダフドゥーの妻、息子、娘がヌセイラート難民キャンプへのイスラエル軍の空爆で死亡したと報じた（The Daily Beast）。
item.description:
The Daily Beast:
Al Jazeera reports that the wife, son, and daughter of its Gaza bureau chief, Wael Al-Dahdouh, were killed by an Israeli airstrike on the Nuseirat refugee camp  —  Gaza bureau chief Wael Al-Dahdouh's wife, son, and daughter were killed in an Israeli airstrike.

item.title: CPJ：イスラエルとハマスの戦争で、10月25日までに少なくとも24人のジャーナリストが殺害された。
item.description:
Jaclyn Diaz / NPR:
CPJ: at least 24 journalists have been killed through October 25 in the Israel-Hamas war, the deadliest period since the committee began tracking deaths in 1992  —  At least 24 journalists are among the more than 6,000 people who have been killed in the ongoing war between Israel and Hamas …

item.title: 英ICO、ナットウエスト前CEOアリソン・ローズ女史がナイジェル・ファラージ氏の銀行口座に関する機密情報を記者に開示し、誤解を招いたと認定（フィナンシャル・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Financial Times:
The UK ICO finds that former NatWest CEO Dame Alison Rose disclosed confidential and misleading information to a journalist about Nigel Farage's bank account  —  ICO regulator finds Alison Rose disclosed confidential and misleading information to journalist in ‘de-banking’ row

item.title: メリッサ・ベルがヴォックスのパブリッシャーを退任、スワティ・シャルマEICはEIC兼パブリッシャーに役割を拡大し、ヴォックス・メディア社長のパム・ワッサースタインに報告する予定（ヴォックス・メディア）
item.description:
Vox Media:
Melissa Bell steps down as Vox's publisher; EIC Swati Sharma plans to expand her role to EIC and publisher, reporting to Vox Media President Pam Wasserstein  —  Today, Melissa Bell announced that she will be stepping down as publisher of Vox, and that editor-in-chief Swati Sharma …

item.title: 億万長者パトリック・ドラヒ氏率いる通信・メディア大手アルティチェが、低金利時代のスキャンダルと負債による買収でいかに重荷になったか（ブルームバーグ）
item.description:
Bloomberg:
How telecoms and media giant Altice, led by billionaire Patrick Drahi, became weighed down by scandals and debt-fueled acquisitions from a low-interest-rate era  —  He built his telecoms empire in an era of low interest rates.  Now, with soaring debt costs and a corruption case in the corporate suite …

item.title: アマゾン、広告主が販売したい商品の周辺に「ライフスタイル・イメージ」の背景やシーンを作成できるジェネレーティブAIツールのベータ版を発表（Chris Welch/The Verge）
item.description:
Chris Welch / The Verge:
Amazon launches a generative AI tool in beta that lets advertisers create “lifestyle imagery” backgrounds or scenes around the products they are hoping to sell  —  Amazon is beta testing AI image generation tools for its advertisers, offering an easy way to create backgrounds …

item.title: Amazon LiveとFlipkartのVibesは、インドでライブストリーミングEコマースを復活させようとしている。
item.description:
Nilesh Christopher / Rest of World:
Amazon Live and Flipkart's Vibes are trying to revive livestreamed e-commerce in India, after most startups that tried to popularize the retail push struggled  —  Most startups that tried to popularize livestream commerce in the country are struggling.  —  • BENGALURU, INDIA

item.title: 情報源トニー・ブリンケン米国務長官は、カタールの首相にアルジャジーラの戦争レトリックを抑えるよう要請したと、米国のユダヤ人コミュニティーのリーダーたちに語った（Barak Ravid/Axios）
item.description:
Barak Ravid / Axios:
Sources: US Secretary of State Tony Blinken told US Jewish community leaders that he asked the Qatari prime minister to tone down Al Jazeera's war rhetoric  —  U.S. Secretary of State Tony Blinken told a group of American Jewish community leaders on Monday that he asked the Qatari prime minister less …

item.title: Apple、「Apple TV+」の米国での月額料金を6.99ドルから9.99ドルへ、「News+」を9.99ドルから12.99ドルへ、「Arcade」を4.99ドルから6.99ドルへ、「Apple One」を16.95ドルから19.95ドルへ値上げ（Joe Rossignol/MacRumors）
item.description:
Joe Rossignol / MacRumors:
Apple raises the monthly US price of Apple TV+ from $6.99 to $9.99, News+ from $9.99 to $12.99, Arcade from $4.99 to $6.99, and Apple One from $16.95 to $19.95  —  Apple today announced that it is increasing the prices of some of its subscription-based services, including Apple TV+ …

item.title: US対グーグル：アミット・メータ判事は、文書の墨消しや非公開の証言を求めるグーグル側の要求を何度も受け入れ、報道擁護派や記者を憂慮させている（Scott Nover/Slate）
item.description:
Scott Nover / Slate:
US v. Google: Judge Amit Mehta has repeatedly accepted Google's requests to redact docs and hold closed-door testimony, alarming press advocates and reporters  —  U.S. v. Google was supposed to be the “antitrust trial of the century”—the highest-profile, and potentially the most consequential …

item.title: WGAWは、イスラエルとハマスの戦争について沈黙したことで「多大な苦痛」を与えたことを謝罪し、ギルドは一般的に国内問題についてのみスタンスを取っていると述べた（Gene Maddaus/Variety）
item.description:
Gene Maddaus / Variety:
WGAW apologizes for the “tremendous pain” caused by its silence on the Israel-Hamas war, saying that the guild generally takes stances only on domestic issues  —  The Writers Guild of America West issued an apology to its members on Tuesday for the harm caused by its decision …

item.title: TikTokが初のグローバル音楽ライブイベント「TikTok in The Mix」を発表、12月10日にアリゾナ州メサで開催、カーディ・B、ナイル・ホーラン、アニッタ、チャーリー・プースが出演（Rania Aniftos/Billboard）
item.description:
Rania Aniftos / Billboard:
TikTok announces TikTok in The Mix, its first live global music event, set for December 10 in Mesa, Arizona, with Cardi B, Niall Horan, Anitta, and Charlie Puth  —  The event will take place on Dec. 10 at Sloan Park in Mesa, Ariz.  —  TikTok is continuing its foray into the music world …
